TopicTitle: Why won't this show up in-game? .dae coordinate woes

Articles.Content:
So I took it upon myself to modify the vanilla LanderLeg to go from +90 to 0 from the horizontal instead of +90 to -45. After learning that the variable I could edit in the .cfg had to do with initial position, not final, I took it upon myself to try and modify the model.

Only I have no idea what the hell I\'m doing. The model does load fine, and it shows up in the parts menu, but I can\'t actually attach it to the ship, and it doesn\'t show up normally, either. I feel like I might have screwed up the coordinates in the .dae somehow, but I can\'t image how. Help, please?

The whole part folder is attached, as I\'m not sure if I screwed up the .dae or the .cfg or both.
